scripts.serve: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others  "onchange 'src/**/*.html' -- npm run html" "onchange 'src/**/*.ts' 'styles/**/*.scss' -- rollup -c" "http-server ./dist"
scripts.build: npm run fresh && concurrently "npm run html" "npm run img" "npm run fonts" "rollup -c"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && concurrently "npm run minjs" "npm run mincss"
scripts.deployS3: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://ccmulch  --delete --region us-east-2 --profile freelance
